## Instructions
```sh
# Update persistent_peers in $HOME/.mars/config/config.toml

PEERS="9cb92702727bc5f3d40154e625b9553a04f4d649@65.109.104.72:18556,e726816f42831689eab9378d5d577f1d06d25716@169.155.171.15:26656,417e6cbca62c6e72769d99da27f16674cbee07c4@147.135.31.22:18556,d93d06ecef0dddeb51fd81ef1b67ae3f95fe11d1@65.109.112.148:181,ade4d8bc8cbe014af6ebdf3cb7b1e9ad36f412c0@135.181.5.219:18556,c46be592341987eae20ac681cb08d2abcc02ab9a@137.74.4.20:2000,20fc747288a45238fbb4b96daabd8be62e253529@162.55.245.149:2020,0b300806d740d536d464d78d71f64c812d86b27a@135.181.222.33:18556,ad9f0d0aee33c46f22f4bad443b610751bd5a8bc@65.108.132.107:36656,becb82a1fbd1b539a413f19967b5148a43bc4515@159.223.55.135:26656,aac1b0f0b0bca801cee629bd405ef5a1cd25c26c@65.108.238.29:18556,d2d2629c8c8a8815f85c58c90f80b94690468c4f@195.201.222.82:26012,86baedb502883a67947c84f62f3b6b89fc630988@107.155.81.98:26656,969af6a39a0f7e8a17b92d90888360ad92248626@65.108.132.107:2000,fae8e8882b11016c5a42fcaea35eb1ebfd281018@62.210.171.71:33003"
```
